definition: example/mirror/to view/reflection/to reflect/to inspect/to warn/(ancient bronze mirror)
to bestow (a reward)/to give (to an inferior)/to hand down/a reward (bestowed by a superior)/to appreciate (beauty)

sentences.english: Appreciation of sculpture depends upon the ability to respond to form in three dimension.
sentences.chinese: 對雕塑的鑑賞力取決於對立體的反應能力。

sentences.english: To really appreciate highlights, we need to zoom in a bit close.
sentences.chinese: 要鑑賞高光，我們需要放大這些細節。

sentences.english: A knowledge of anatomy adds to the appreciation of works of art.
sentences.chinese: 解剖學知識有助於提高對藝術作品的鑑賞力。

sentences.english: He has a good ear for music.
Even imagine yourself a connoisseur of that focus point.
sentences.chinese: 甚至想象你自己是一個鑑賞家。

sentences.english: The high standard of workmanship will appeal to the most discriminating buyer.
sentences.chinese: 能吸引最有鑑賞能力的買主。

sentences.english: The connoisseurs often associate it with a blackcurrant flavor.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄酒鑑賞家們通常會將它跟黑醋栗口味聯繫起來。

sentences.english: You were surprised at the extent of his knowledge and the sensitiveness of his taste.
sentences.chinese: 他知識淵博，鑑賞精細，會讓你感到驚訝。

sentences.english: I suspect their taste in higher matters.
sentences.chinese: 我對這種人對較高級事物的鑑賞力表示懷疑。

sentences.english: The paper analyzes how to improve senior middle school students' music appreciation ability.
sentences.chinese: 現就如何提高高中學生的音樂鑑賞能力進行簡要分析。

sentences.english: Become a connoisseur of the best things other people have done.
sentences.chinese: 讓自己成爲一個鑑賞家，鑑賞那些由他人完成的佳作。

sentences.english: Become a connoisseur of the best things other people have done.
sentences.chinese: 讓自己成爲一個鑑賞家，鑑賞那些由他人完成的佳作。

sentences.english: It is essential to identify the colour of ancient jade in dividing the generation of ancient jade.
sentences.chinese: 對古玉顏色的鑑別是玉器鑑賞與斷代的重要依據。

sentences.english: For centuries art detectives had to rely mainly on connoisseurship.
sentences.chinese: 幾個世紀以來，偵探必須主要依賴其鑑賞力。

sentences.english: But the shape you choose really just comes down to your own aesthetic taste.
sentences.chinese: 酒具的形狀並不重要，主要看你自己的鑑賞品位。

sentences.english: For music and clothing i have special percipient.
sentences.chinese: 我對音樂和服裝都有獨特的鑑賞力。

definition: carefully chosen/handpicked/best of the bunch/choice (product)/concentration (mining)/to concentrate/to winnow
to bestow (a reward)/to give (to an inferior)/to hand down/a reward (bestowed by a superior)/to appreciate (beauty)
appreciation of the finer things in life
net for fishing or bird catching/(fig.) fetters/to snare (a valuable new team member etc)/to bring together under the one umbrella
